alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 12:31PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN CROCKETT...SOUTHEASTERN DYER...SOUTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE AND NORTHERN HAYWOOD COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CST... At 1231 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Alamo, Halls, Chestnut Bluff, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Henning, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Hawkinsville, Dryhill, Frog Jump, Flippin, Maury Junction, Curve, Dog Hill, Brims Corner, Tibbs, and Durhamville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.
